channel.title: Pnpc 2311

item.title: Pnpc 2311
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Um… try:

}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("2311")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); 2311 = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
But i’m unreliable. I am almost certain this is wrong, because I have a bad feeling about it. Try it anyway, but back up your files. I’ve been lucky with my codes lately, but I can’t stay lucky much longer.

~Retard

Read full topic

item.title: Pnpc 2311
item.dc:creator: @doomsword222 doomsword222
item.description:
@doomsword222 wrote:

I’m making a new server, my other one kinda… got deleted and it’s not in Trash Basket thing.

So, I wanted to make ::pnpc 2311 for everyone, but ::pnpc -anything else- for mod+

Here is my code if you need it.

}else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such PNPC. -.-"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

I thought maybe this would work though

}else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC == 2311) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("Mod only, sauczy"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Redo it."); } }

(I’m going to put it as a command in the emote tab, I already know how though.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2008, 09:03:47 am[/size][hr]Well, I cant edit now but i meant to say

}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pnpc 2311")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC == 2311) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("Mod only, sauczy"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Redo it."); } }

Soz for DP, but its not letting me edit it.
